headline: Stockholders Approve Omnicom's Proposed Acquisition of Interpublic
summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) and Interpublic (NYSE: IPG) today announced that each company's respective stockholders overwhelmingly approved Omnicom's previously announced acquisition of Interpublic at each company's Special Meeting of Stockholders held today. The companies remain on track to complete the transaction in the second half of 2025.
